full_output.summary: Dedicated and results-driven Computer Science graduate with a robust academic background and hands-on experience in software development and problem-solving. Demonstrates strong analytical and critical thinking abilities. Known for exceptional communication skills, attention to detail, and a commitment to continuous learning and professional development. Seeking to contribute to a forward-thinking organization where these strengths can drive impactful contributions and support organizational goals.

education.school: Board of Intermediate Education Andhra Pradesh
Board of Secondary Education Andhra Pradesh

projects.name: Real Estate Management System
projects.description: I led the development of a full-stack real estate management system, employing modern web technologies. This involved designing user-friendly interfaces for property listings and management, implementing robust authentication, and authorization mechanisms. Additionally, I integrated advanced search functionalities to enhance user experience and data security.

projects.name: Hotel Management System
projects.description: I orchestrated the creation of a sophisticated hotel management system leveraging Django, a powerful web framework. The system streamlined essential hotel operations such as reservation management, room allocation, and guest services. By harnessing Djangos built-in security features, I ensured robust access control and data integrity, optimizing the efficiency and reliability of hotel operations.

experiences.description: Participated in a JPMorgan hackathon as a full-stack developer, where I collaborated with a team to create an innovative financial web application using the MERN stack. Led the development of key features, ensuring seamless integration between the front-end and back-end. Achieved recognition for delivering a robust and scalable solution within a tight deadline.

During my internship at APSSDC, I honed my web development skills through hands-on projects and mentorship. I contributed to the development of web applications, gaining valuable experience in frontend and backend technologies.

full_output.name: Pujitha Mupparaju
